projects.title: tommyzki-cv (Portfolio)
projects.description: My upcoming personal portfolio website, planned to be hosted on GitHub Pages, showcasing my journey and projects.

projects.title: tommyzki-ui
projects.description: A library of reusable web components generated using StencilJS. These components are framework-agnostic and can be used in React, Angular, Vue, or vanilla HTML projects.

projects.title: Client Data Analytics Platform
projects.description: Developed key frontend modules for a B2B data analytics platform using Angular, enabling clients to gain insights from large datasets. Focused on component reusability and performance.

projects.title: Mobile-First E-commerce Site
projects.description: Built responsive UI/UX features for a high-traffic e-commerce website using React and Next.js. Implemented state management solutions and integrated with various third-party APIs.

projects.title: Internal Workflow Automation Tool
projects.description: Designed and implemented an internal tool with Angular to automate critical business workflows, significantly improving operational efficiency and reducing manual data entry.

projects.title: JavaScript Frameworks Evolution: jQuery to Angular 18
projects.description: JavaScript frameworks have dramatically evolved over the years, shaping how we build web applications.

projects.title: No Code, No Problem: How AI Just Killed the Frontend Developer
projects.description: Built a full website with just a prompt — no code. Is this the end of software engineering as we know it? Welcome to the AI dev era.

projects.title: The Future of Web Components
projects.description: An exploration of Web Components, their current state, and their potential impact on the future of web development. Stay tuned!

projects.title: Becoming a PMO/BA from a Developer Background
projects.description: Sharing insights and my journey on transitioning from a frontend developer role to project management or business analysis. Article in progress.
